snippet.title: Last Train Home | Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Last Train Home is a compelling narrative that portrays the experiences of the Czechoslovak Legion and their determination to return to their newly formed republic following The Great War. It was a challenging mission, as they were caught in a brutal civil war between Russia's Red and White Armies.

Last Train Home is coming to PC soon!

Learn more here: lasttrainhome.thqnordic.com

- Links & Info -
